name: Yrminsul
description: YRMINSUL is a strategy game in a persistent universe where each combat is held in the form of a Tower Defence. Crush the forces of good!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 & 10 Processor: 2.9 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X9 compatible Storage: 4 GB available space

reviews.review_text: A simple tower defence with some nice features like ambush and persistent maps. If you whant a casual TD game this is for you.
